meaningMnemonic: <vocabulary>研修</vocabulary> is a training or study of some kind. If it's in your current <kanji>life</kanji> (生) that you are doing the training, then you are a <vocabulary>trainee</vocabulary>. This is a lot like how a student is in the status of "study life."
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. The reading from 研修 should also help you too.
